CustomField.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Payment to Assessment Provider"), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Payment to Client"), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Payment to Lawyer"), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Payment to other lender"), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Payment to Third-Party")), Amount__c > 0, OR(ISNULL(Rejections_Count__c), Rejections_Count__c=0) )
CustomField.label: Can Be Reversed
